text: Dr Seah is a very experienced and caring doctor. I first went to see him for an eye infection sometime ago and was treated and recovered from it very quickly. Recently, I finally decided to do Lasik after much consideration. I must say I am very pleased with the result. Dr Seah has been very reassuring throughout and I feel well taken care of.  I have since recommended my family and friends to go to him for their eye concerns.

Dr Steve Seah has been taking care of my glaucoma since 2009. Though I have lost some vision field when I first consulted him, the surgeries & treatment plans put forth by Dr Seah have curbed the visual deterioration and have enabled me to live a normal & productive life. I am currently a patient of Dr Seah and grateful to have my optical condition treated by him.
Been a patient of Dr Seah for 16 years. Very professional and skilled eye specialist / surgeon. My glaucoma operation done 16 years ago still working well and in stable condition. Highly recommended.

Comprehensive, professional eye examinations done for my mum. Dr Seah is patient in explaining the condition of cataracts. Offers detailed choices of lenses , pros and cons .
Efficient and friendly staff.
Overall pleasant experience.

I'm so lucky that Dr Seah managed to catch a developing eye condition early on, which allowed me to obtain treatment promptly. I'm now seeing him for regular follow-ups and he never fails to be detailed and assuring each time.
